name: dash-bash-utility
description: Progressive Web App for DoorDash delivery drivers with target calculator, dashers management, and address book

scripts.build: npm run extract-jsx && npm run compile
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add index.html dash-bash-compiled.js && git commit -m 'build: precompiled JSX for v1.9.1' && git push origin main && git checkout gh-pages && git merge main --no-edit && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout main
